summary.span: 启用用于 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序，帮助确保用户具有足够的安全级别来访问数据源。

span.span: Enables the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server to help make sure that a user has a security level sufficient to access a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性优先于属性。The property takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果你设置到`false`，还必须设置到`false`以防止用户进行使用空密码的连接。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `false` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password. > [!NOTE] > 在为 ADO.NET 中使用代码访问安全性权限，正确的模式是以限制性最强的情况 （无任何权限） 开始，然后添加该代码需要执行的特定任务所需的特定权限。When using code access security permissions for ADO.NET, the correct pattern is to start with the most restrictive case (no permissions at all) and then add the specific permissions that are needed for the particular task that the code needs to perform. 相反的模式，开始具有所有权限，然后拒绝特定权限，并不安全，因为有多种方法表达同一连接字符串中。The opposite pattern, starting with all permissions and then denying a specific permission, is not secure, because there are many ways of expressing the same connection string. 例如，如果一开始就授予所有权限，然后尝试拒绝使用连接字符串“server=someserver”，则仍将允许使用“server=someserver.mycompany.com”。For example, if you start with all permissions and then attempt to deny the use of the connection string "server=someserver", the string "server=someserver.mycompany.com" would still be allowed. 通过在开始时始终不授予任何权限，可以降低权限集中存在漏洞的几率。By always starting by granting no permissions at all, you reduce the chances that there are holes in the permission set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于配置特定的权限对象允许的连接字符串。Use this method to configure which connection strings are allowed by a particular permission object. 如果你想要仅允许特定连接字符串和其他任何内容，例如，使用下面的代码片段：For example, use the following code fragment if you want to only allow a specific connection string and nothing else: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; database=MyDatabase; Integrated Security=true", "", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` 下面的示例允许使用任何数据库，但仅在服务器和名为 MyServer，任何用户和密码组合不包含任何其他连接字符串关键字的连接字符串：The following example allows connection strings that use any database, but only on the server named MyServer, with any user and password combination and containing no other connection string keywords: `permission.Add("server=MyServer;", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` 以下示例按上面所述使用相同的方案，但允许的连接到配置为镜像服务器时可以使用故障转移合作伙伴：The following example uses the same scenario as above but allows for a failover partner that can be used when connecting to servers configured for mirroring: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; failover partner=MyMirrorServer", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` > [!NOTE] > 在为 ADO.NET 中使用代码访问安全性权限，正确的模式是以限制性最强的情况 （无任何权限） 开始，然后添加该代码需要执行的特定任务所需的特定权限。When using code access security permissions for ADO.NET, the correct pattern is to start with the most restrictive case (no permissions at all) and then add the specific permissions that are needed for the particular task that the code needs to perform. 相反的模式，开始具有所有权限，然后尝试拒绝特定权限，是不安全，因为有许多方式表达同一连接字符串。The opposite pattern, starting with all permissions and then trying to deny a specific permission, is not secure, because there are many ways of expressing the same connection string. 例如，如果一开始就授予所有权限，然后尝试拒绝使用连接字符串“server=someserver”，则仍将允许使用“server=someserver.mycompany.com”。For example, if you start with all permissions and then attempt to deny the use of the connection string "server=someserver", the string "server=someserver.mycompany.com" would still be allowed. 通过在开始时始终不授予任何权限，可以降低权限集中存在漏洞的几率。By always starting by granting no permissions at all, you reduce the chances that there are holes in the permission set.
